title: "University of Toronto scientists use machine learning to fast-track drug formulation development"
excerpt: "Scientists at the University of Toronto have successfully tested the use of machine learning models to guide the design of long-acting injectable drug formulations. The potential for machine learning algorithms to accelerate drug formulation could reduce the time and cost associated with drug development,"
